product_name: The North Face Paramount Tech T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: By efficiently wicking moisture, The North Face Paramount Tech T-shirt is a game changer for comfort during highly aerobic activities. Hybrid construction of polyester and elastane positions panels under the arms for good breathability, even when layering this long-sleeve under a jacket. With a UPF 30 rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Flatlock seams maximize motion and minimize abrasion.
short_description: By efficiently wicking moisture, The North Face Paramount Tech T-shirt is a game changer for comfort during highly aerobic activities.
